Description
io.jstach.jstachio.spi
JStachio Service Provider extension points API.
io.jstach.opt.jmustache
JMustache extension to JStachio to enable dynamic development of templates.

    Description

    Creates a composite filter of a many filters.
    JStachioFilter
    JStachioExtensions.getFilter()
    Composite Filter where the ordering of the filter is based on a combination of order() first and then the order in the iterable passed to JStachioExtensions.of(Iterable).
    default @Nullable JStachioFilter
    JStachioExtensionProvider.provideFilter()
    Provide a filter or not.

    Classes in io.jstach.opt.jmustache that implement JStachioFilter
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    JMustacheRenderer
    Deprecated.
    This extension does not reliably mimic JStachio's mustache support unfortunately based on feedback we have decided to deprecate this and recommend using other mechanisms for hot reload.
